price: Also Ishmael, Elisha, Jonah, and Lot – each of them We preferred over all other people [of their times].
arabic: وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَٱلۡيَسَعَ وَيُونُسَ وَلُوطٗاۚ وَكُلّٗا فَضَّلۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
